sources.title: Sahara 1943 colorized (Humphrey Bogart)
sources.description: Adventures of an American tank crew in the North African desert in World War II during the Allied retreat after the fall of Tobruk. Humphrey Bogart as Sgt. Joe Gunn Bruce Bennett as Waco Hoyt J. Carrol Naish as Giuseppe Lloyd Bridges as Fred Clarkson Rex Ingram as Sgt. Maj. Tambul Richard Aherne as Capt. Jason Halliday Dan Duryea as Jimmy Doyle Carl Harbord as Marty Williams Patrick O'Moore as Osmond 'Ozzie' Bates Louis Mercier as Jean 'Frenchie' Leroux Guy Kingsford as Peter Stegman Kurt Kreuger as Capt. von Schletow John Wengraf as Maj. Von Falken I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
